nodes.text: Talaos City was the capital of the planet Makeb.

Talaos City was built somewhere near the landing site of the original colonists, who were Republic refugees, during the Mandalorian Wars. The planet's inhabitants made an effort to keep industrial activities separate from the city. As a result, Talaos City became the center of Makeb's banking and technological economy and the heart of the planet's culture. The most upstanding citizens of Talaos City were typically awarded the Talaos City Medallion.
Talaos City appears in the massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic. It was introduced in Rise of the Hutt Cartel, a 2013 digital expansion to the video game.
